name: Aguri Suzuki F-1 Super Driving
description: Aguri Suzuki F-1 Super Driving (鈴木亜久里のＦ１スーパードライビング, Suzuki Aguri no F-1 Super Driving, "Aguri Suzuki's F-1 Super Driving"), released as Redline F-1 Racer in North America, is a Formula One racing simulator for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The game is named after and sponsored by the Japanese Formula 1 driver Aguri Suzuki.
